name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Paramount Plus: Stream Movies, Shows & Live TV

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Watch thousands of hit movies and episodes of your favorite shows, all in one place. Stream it all on Paramount+.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Watch thousands of hit movies and episodes of your favorite shows, all in one place. Stream it all on Paramount+.



Watch full episodes on demand from hit series like Survivor, NCIS, SpongeBob SquarePants, Big Brother and more!
- Obsess over originals. Watch subscriber-only originals such as Star Trek: Strange New Worlds, 1923 and Special Ops: Lioness.
- Make every night a movie night with blockbuster hits and fan-favorite films from Paramount Pictures, MGM and more.
- Access live streams with around-the-clock news coverage on CBS News 24/7, scores + highlights on CBS Sports HQ and entertainment news on Mixible, plus 20 live channels of curated favorites.
- Create up to 6 individual profiles for each member of your household. Have kids? Use our Kids Mode profile feature.






















Enhance your browsing experience with the Paramount+ Plus Chrome Extension! This extension adds a variety of useful features, including Picture in Picture mode, page brightness adjustment, and quick access to watch your favorite content via Crunchyroll.

Features:
Picture in Picture Mode: Easily watch videos in a floating window while you continue browsing other tabs.
Adjust Page Brightness: Control the brightness of any webpage to make your viewing experience more comfortable, especially in low-light conditions.
Quick Access to Crunchyroll: Right-click on any image on any webpage and select "Watch via Paramount+" to be redirected to Crunchyroll for a seamless watching experience.
Automatic Thank You Page: After installing the extension, you will be greeted with a thank you page, welcoming you to enjoy the new features.
